definition: The state or condition of lacking moisture or being dry, often used to describe a climate or weather condition. It is commonly used to refer to a lack of rainfall or humidity in a specific area.

examples.german: Die Trockenheit hat zu Ernteausfällen geführt.
examples.english: The drought has led to crop failures.

examples.german: Die Trockenheit der Haut kann durch regelmäßiges Eincremen gelindert werden.
examples.english: The dryness of the skin can be relieved by regular moisturizing.

examples.german: Die Trockenheit der Kehle machte es schwer zu schlucken.
examples.english: The dryness of the throat made it difficult to swallow.

examples.german: Die Trockenheit des Bodens führte zu Waldbränden.
examples.english: The dryness of the soil led to wildfires.

examples.german: Die Trockenheit der Luft verursachte statische Elektrizität.
examples.english: The dryness of the air caused static electricity.
